And these <S%G5023><s%> things give in charge, <S%G3853><s%> that they may be blameless. <S%G423><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> provide <S%G4306><s%> not for his own, <S%G2398><s%> and specially <S%G3122><s%> for those <S%G3588><s%> of his own <S%G2398><s%> house, <S%G3609><s%> he has denied <S%G720><s%> the faith, <S%G4102><s%> and is worse <S%G5501><s%> than an infidel. <S%G571><s%>

For some <S%G5100><s%> are already <S%G2235><s%> turned <S%G1624><s%> aside <S%G1624><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man or <S%G2228><s%> woman that believes <S%G4103><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> widows, <S%G5503><s%> let them relieve <S%G1884><s%> them, and let not the church <S%G1577><s%> be charged; <S%G916><s%> that it may relieve <S%G1884><s%> them that are widows <S%G5503><s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

Let the elders <S%G4245><s%> that rule <S%G4291><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> be counted <S%G515><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> of double <S%G1362><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> they who labor <S%G2872><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> and doctrine. <S%G1319><s%>

For the scripture <S%G1124><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> You shall not muzzle <S%G5392><s%> the ox <S%G1016><s%> that treads <S%G248><s%> out the corn. And, The laborer <S%G2040><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> of his reward. <S%G3408><s%>
